title: Tree facet with stats component
description:
Hi , 

My requirement is to fetch results like below sql query:

Select  txn_code,
		txn_server,
		max(total_time), 
		min(total_time),
		max(db_time), 
		min(db_time),
from txn_table
group by txn_code,txn_server.


	statsComponent helps to get  aggregate results & stats.facet is available for single field , but my requirement is to have multi level facet on more than 1 field while fetching results.



Please let me know , how to get this using solr , do we have this planned in any upcoming release, or any patch is available ?

Thanks & Regards,
Sumit.

comments.author: Shalin Shekhar Mangar
comments.content: Please ask questions on solr-user mailing list before creating jira issues.
